keycloak.title: Keycloak Management Console
keycloak.description: Access the Keycloak administration interface to manage users, roles, and authentication settings.
keycloak.whatIsKeycloakDesc: Keycloak is an open-source identity and access management platform. It handles user authentication, authorization, and role management for this application.

mtls.title: What is mTLS?
mtls.paragraph1: By using an mTLS key installed on your device to connect to our service, we can ensure the connection comes from you. No one else can impersonate you.
mtls.paragraph2: Likewise, you are assured that on the other end, it's us.
mtls.paragraph3: All services from Deploy App (Rasenmäher) that you take into use encrypt their traffic with your mTLS key.
